product_name: Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Crew Long Underwear Top - Women's
long_description: During activity in cool weather when midweight base layers are too hot, the women's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Crew Long Underwear Top offers very light warmth against the skin. Stretchy, quick-drying and moisture-wicking polyester and spandex fabric offers very light insulation against skin. Odor-resistant fabric treatment helps deter odors. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Offset seams enhance mobility without chafing. The women's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Crew Long Underwear Top offers a slim fit.
short_description: During activity in cool weather when midweight base layers are too hot, the women's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Crew Long Underwear Top offers very light warmth against the skin.
